btrplace.solver.choco

Interface ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultChocoReconfigurationAlgorithm, DefaultChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams

    public interface ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams
    Parameters for a ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithm.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

        ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams doRepair(boolean b)
        State if the algorithm only have to repair the model instead of rebuilding a complete new solution.
        Parameters:
        b - true to repair
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • doRepair

        boolean doRepair()
        Indicate if the algorithm repair the model.
        Returns:
        true iff it repairs the model.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the current instance

        Tell is the solver tries to improve the first computed solution.
        Returns:
        true iff it try to improve the solution

      • setTimeLimit

        ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams setTimeLimit(int t)
        Set the timeout value for the solving process. Use a negative number to remove any timeout.
        Parameters:
        t - the timeout value, in second.
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • getTimeLimit

        int getTimeLimit()
        Get the timeout value.
        Returns:
        a positive integer in seconds to indicate the timeout value or a negative value to indicate no timeout has been set

      • setVerbosity

        ChocoReconfigurationAlgorithmParams setVerbosity(int lvl)
        Set the verbosity level of the solver.
        • Level 0: no information about the solving process
        • Level 1: variables are labelled
        • Level 2: solutions of Choco are printed
        • Level 3: choices are printed
        Parameters:
        lvl - the verbosity level
        Returns:
        the current instance

      • getVerbosity

        int getVerbosity()
        Get the verbosity level of the solver.
        Returns:
        the verbosity level.
        See Also:
        setVerbosity(int)

      • setTransitionFactory

        void setTransitionFactory(TransitionFactory amf)
        Set the factory that is used to model the transitions.
        Parameters:
        amf - the factory to rely on

      • getTransitionFactory

        TransitionFactory getTransitionFactory()
        Get the current factory that is used to model the transitions.
        Returns:
        the factory

      • addSolverViewBuilder

        Declare a builder that create solve-only views.
        Parameters:
        b - the builder to add

      • removeSolverViewBuilder

        boolean removeSolverViewBuilder(SolverViewBuilder b)
        Remove a builder dedicated to solver-only views.
        Parameters:
        b - the builder to remove
        Returns:
        true iff the builder has been removed

      • getSolverViews

        Collection<SolverViewBuilder> getSolverViews()
        Get the solver-only view builders.
        Returns:
        a collection that may be empty
